The story was great

8/10

How do you one-up the Orange Box? In even MORE spectacular fashion, apparently. Brilliantly crafted, not half as glitchy, frantically fun co-op, heartfelt lore, game-changing gel mechanics, loads of old and new faces and most importantly: cake?

Can't sing this game's praises enough; never get to play the co-op half as much as I'd like. Only thing missing is the long-awaited update to the hat store LOL. Bought me a few hats 'n' flags 'n' emotes 'n' stuff back in the day. I'd like to see an emote system that allows you to equip all the ones you've bought at once, but fat chance of Valve re-visiting this aspect of the game. Oh well...

One of two Valve games I actually own a boxed copy of. Play the first one if you haven't already.
